text: Walter Leslie Ware (19 March 1906 – 15 January 1994) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Originally from Sale, Victoria, his younger brother Norman Ware, played and coached Footscray, winning the Brownlow Medal in 1941. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1906 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Hawthorn Football Club players Category:Sale Football Club players Category:People from Sale, Victoria
title: Wally Ware
